mean_cn: n. 古怪，怪癖，【数】离心率
mean_en: an act or habit that is strange or unusual
word_etyma: eccentric古怪的 + ity名词后缀 → eccentricity 古怪
short_phrase: the eccentricity of his eating habits
sentence: I like my friend because of the eccentricity of his eating habits.
sentence_trans: 我因为朋友那古怪的进食习惯而喜欢他。
sentence_phrase: the eccentricity of his eating habits
